name: Legs of Legion
effect:
:instant: Reduce the Recruitment or Reinforcement cost of a [unit](../units/index.md) by 4 :gold: - to a minimum of 0.

— OR —

:instant: Gain 2 :gold:.
flavor_text: Searching a ruin, you are amazed to find a piece of the Statue of Legion. You carefully dust it off before placing it into your pack.
